game_description: Meta Spark Player is a testing ground for virtual objects, a type of interactive, world-facing AR experience. Use the app to interact with ready-made demo objects or send your own virtual objects directly from Meta Spark Studio. - Connect to Meta Spark Studio and send virtual objects directly to the app. - Take a tutorial to understand how to control virtual objects with your Meta Quest device controllers. - Manipulate virtual object position, scale and rotation. - Test inputs to see virtual objects in different states. - Use demo objects to explore what‚Äôs possible.
review_1: This is for ar creators to test their ar content in vr! If you don‚Äôt make Instagram filters, this isn‚Äôt for you! That being said it gets one star because I do lake Instagram filters and when I pushed my current filter to the headset just says to ‚Äúupdate spark vr player‚Äù ??? Its up to date!
review_2: The ingame phone ar tool just shows a graphical artifact. I feel like this was also the case on the PC version, but I don't remember.
review_3: This will be boring and useless apps if you don't try to make effect for Spark AR. I'm not pro in these apps but just a quick try creating simple effect on it by just using Surface Go 2 directly transfer to Oculus Quest. And it works flawless.. i can view the effect in different virtual environment without going out in open area with my phone. Well done FB
review_4: AR in VR? Why? Why not AR in real life through passthrough? What's the reason of AR in VR?
